revised_title: On the Theory of Consistency of Logical Class-Frequencies and Its Geometrical Representation
tldr: The author presents a theory of strictly quantitative logic, discussing the conditions of consistence for logical class-frequencies and their geometrical representation. The theory focuses on the relationship between different frequencies and how they must be consistent to be self-consistent. The author also introduces the concepts of inferior and superior conditions of consistence and discusses congruences of aggregates.
